@CNNPolitics Classic propaganda techniques are perpetrated by POTUS. That's something I never thought I'd say. Trump and Giuliani mock and show contempt/disdain for the US Constitution on a daily basis. It's nauseating.

@CNNPolitics I agree this is a battle for hearts and minds via PR. But as Independents (~42% of voters) are stripped away from the Trump movement by dawning realization and some Republicans (~24% of voters)  reconsider support ( a la Koch Brothers), there is a chance Trump will lose the war.

@CNNPolitics just days before the election obama made a nationwide speech assuring Americans that “our elections can’t be hacked, I have DHS guarding them” where then are the hearings on how they, along with our law enforcement and intelligence agencies failed us?

@CNNPolitics It's not the Russian probe that will bring him down, it's the money laundering. Plus Mueller doesn't have to indict  Trump, but he could take out the kids which could be used as leverage.
@CNNPolitics Get them all Mueller.
@CNNPolitics I'm sure his FBI, justice department and intel brief him on all of this so he knows his exposure.
@CNNPolitics Desperate much?
